channel.title: CVE Feed for MCU Technologies -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MCU Technologies -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-32536|2024-09-16T22:10:15.250Z -- mcu%20technologies -- mcusystem
item.description: The login page in the MCUsystem does not filter with special characters, which allows remote attackers can inject JavaScript without privilege and thus perform reflected XSS attacks.
